---
category: news
title: "AI: Technology magnifying human bias"
excerpt: "In AI, gender bias pops up through subservient female virtual assistants, human-resources software that prefers male candidates, and banking algorithms that unfairly assess credit applications from women. Instead of adding a healthy dose of objectivity to human decision-making, AI can just make already unfair systems even more oppressive."
